def_cn: (加在动词后构成现在分词;现在分词可与助动词一起构成进行时态或像形容词一样使用)
def_en: -ing is added to verbs to form present participles. Present participles are used with auxiliary verbs to make continuous tenses. They are also used like adjectives, describing a person or thing as doing something.

def_cn: (用于动词后构成表示活动的不可数名词)
def_en: -ing is added to verbs to form uncount nouns referring to activities.
